title: Email problems
body:
Hello! im having some problems with my email. 2 days ago i got my old email hacked. It's all taken care of know but from that i got an other problem. 
Now i want to change my LoL email from my old to my new. But when i try to change it it says : A passcode has been sent to the email address: *****@**********.**  This passcode will expire in ten minutes. Please enter the code you receive:

The problem is that i don't get any emails. I have been trying for 30 min now and still nothing happends. Please help me. 

                                                       Exotic {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body: If you believe the email is being sent to the correct address, then you might have spam filters that's labeling the email to a different inbox.  If you still have problems locating your email, you can reach out to us in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our account team can help with changing your email.  We'll respond to your ticket asap!
